name: Technomancer and the Sword
description:
YOU are called on to repair AN OLD ARCADE MACHINE
A world, hidden inside, is in dire need of your magic...

...of your SWORD.

Luckily, YOU aren't alone.

As you uncover multiple paths and branching realities,
you'll learn what it takes to repair a world.

YOUR FATE AWAITS.


FIGHT KNIGHTS

PURSUE TIME TRAVEL

LIVE A NORMAL LIFE

LEVEL UP

OUTSMART SECRET AGENTS

RISE FROM THE DEAD

SLED DOWN A VOLCANO

FIND YOUR SWORD


With over 70 endings,
Only YOU have the power to CHOOSE.
